content.text:
[cron:1dd7299c-1d2e-40bc-a1a2-0c2cf189d9c5 Daily Stock Rumor Scanner] Run the stock rumor scanner. Execute: cd ~/.openclaw/workspace/skills/stock-analysis && python3 scripts/rumor_scanner.py --json. Parse output for: M&A rumors, insider activity, analyst upgrades/downgrades, high impact signals. ALSO do these web searches: 1) Asian stock market news today (Japan, China, Korea, Hong Kong) 2) European/London stock market news today 3) US pre-market movers 4) Fed/political news. For each signal/pick, provide: 1) Ticker 2) Signal type 3) Price target 4) Entry price 5) Hold duration (1 day, 2 days, 5 days, 1-2 weeks) 6) Risk level. Factor in global markets and deliver actionable trade ideas.
Current time: Friday, February 20th, 2026 ‚Äî 7:00 AM (America/New_York)

Return your summary as plain text; it will be delivered automatically. If the task explicitly calls for messaging a specific external recipient, note who/where it should go instead of sending it yourself.
